game.name: Doughlings: Invasion
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Another tribute paid to yet another arcade classic from the Hero Concept team! Doughlings: Invasion promises a fun gaming experience to gamers of all ages with the innovations it brings to the shooting genre.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Another tribute paid to yet another arcade classic from the Hero Concept team! Doughlings: Invasion promises a fun gaming experience to gamers of all ages with the innovations it brings to the shooting genre.
